resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104507</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104507</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202812</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">We Read Every Day!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wir Lasen Jeden Tag!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nous Avons lu Chaque Jour !</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nós Lemos Cada Dia!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Abbiamo letto Ogni Giorno!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαβάζουμε κάθε ημέρα!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Leímos Cada Día!</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will, through observation outside of the classroom, gather and bring to class five items that exhibit different sources of information comprised of more complex vocabulary.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer werden, durch Beobachtung außerhalb des 
Klassenzimmers, Versammlung und Kategorie fünf zu den Einzelteilen zu
holen, die die unterschiedlichen Quellen der Informationen enthalten 
vom komplizierteren Wortschatz ausstellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants , par l'observation en dehors de de la 
salle de classe, rassemblement et apporter aux éléments de la classe
cinq qui montrent différentes sources d'information consistées en un
vocabulaire plus complexe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes , com a observação fora da sala de aula, 
recolhimento e para trazer aos artigos da classe cinco que exibem as 
fontes diferentes da informação compreendidas de um vocabulário 
mais complexo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi, con l'osservazione fuori dell'aula, 
riunire e portare agli articoli del codice categoria cinque 
che esibiscono le sorgenti differenti delle informazioni formate da 
vocabolario più complesso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές, μέσω της παρατήρησης έξω από την 
τάξη, θα συλλέξουν και θα φέρουν στην κλάση πέντε τα αντικείμενα
που εκθέτουν τις διαφορετικές πηγές πληροφοριών που αποτελούνται 
από το πιό σύνθετο λεξιλόγιο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes , con la observación fuera de la sala de 
clase, frunce y traer a los items de la clase cinco que exhiben 
diversas fuentes de la información abarcadas de un vocabulario más 
complejo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:JANET BURNHAM
FN:JANET BURNHAM
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202812</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104507</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/we-read-every-day</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
